title: [Large-Scale] Augmented Reality-Based Khmer Vocabulary Expansion Program (AR-Khmer Quest)

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Khmer pronunciation and script system comprehension
context.additional_context: Strengthening effective communication competencies with local teams as science field overseas project managers

learning_goals: After six months, learners can articulate 500 Khmer technical terms in situational contexts with over 80% pronunciation accuracy.
Learners can perform five or more Khmer communication scenarios in local work environments through AR-based simulations.
Learners can translate and analyze one or more technical documents written in Khmer through project-based assessments.

resources: 30 tablet devices for smart device rental
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
